messages.subject: Re: new and 14 yr old questions
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I am very new to the group but I ve been doing much  research about the options we will have unschooling.  There is the local library which teaches classes
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I am very new to the group but I've been doing much research about the
options we will have unschooling. There is the local library which teaches
classes in computers, at least here in Baton Rouge; there is also this site
called zero tuition college where kids can pair with mentors; there are
continuing education course offered at any nearby university or college
(these cost a bit); there are thrift stores that sell older computers really
cheap (you could get a book o computer repair and let him just take the old
thing apart and learn), maybe someone would be willing to donate one as
well....just a few suggestions...In Louisiana I believe the kids have to be
15 to work legally..
Peace
Renee Perez


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
